thread.title: Quick quiz: Do you know the basics of the EU?
thread.title_full: Quick quiz: Do you know the basics of the EU? - BBC News

author: BBC
title: Quick quiz: Do you know the basics of the EU?
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device Quick quiz: Do you know the basics of the EU? 13 October 2015 Last updated at 15:05 BST
The UK is set to have a referendum by the end of 2017 on whether or not to remain a member of the European Union.
Both "in" and "out" campaigns have launched. But how well-informed are people on the basics of the EU?
A recent poll from YouGov found that 16% of people in the UK are undecided on how they will vote. There's a clearly a desire to know more, as Newsnight finds out.
More on the EU:
In or out? The arguments for and against
A guide to the EU referendum
EU referendum: What will happen when?
